dct_title_s: Map showing the telegraph lines in operation, under contract, and contemplated, to complete the circuit of the globe

dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures.  From the Nathaniel Prentice Banks papers in LC Manuscript Division.  Includes note. Dimensions: 41 x 63 centimeters
